text: gei mee ga hilihili aga ana daane e dolu mana (3,000) mai digau Israel, lua mana (2,000) i dono baahi i Michmash mo i tenua gonduu i Bethel, gei e mana (1,000) i baahi o dana dama daane go Jonathan i Gibeah i tenua o di madawaawa Benjamin, gei digau ala i golo huogodoo gu hagau gii hula gi nadau hale.
